using AnotherECS.Core;

namespace AnotherECS.Gen.Project
{
<#ARRAY [0..STATE:COUNT]#>
    public static class SystemInstaller_<#STATE:GEN_NAME#>
    {
        private static bool _isNoInstalled = true;

        public static void Install()
        {
            if (_isNoInstalled)
            {
                _isNoInstalled = false;
                InstallInternal();
            }
        }

        private static void InstallInternal()
        {
---<#ARRAY [0..SYSTEM:COUNT]#>
            SystemGlobalRegister.Install<<#SYSTEM:NAME#>>(<#INDEX1#>);
---<#END#>
        }
<#END#>
    }
